GapFillInput.Title: Present perfect simple
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verb in brackets into the correct form (Present perfect simple or Past simple).

Content.Question:
1. I've worked|I have worked (I / work) with this company for two years now.
2. We stayed (We / stay) in Tibet for two weeks last summer.
3. How long have you been (you / be) here in Britain?
4. Bill has lived|Bill's lived (Bill / live) in Florida since he got married.
5. When did Mel meet (Mel / meet) Daniel?
6. I haven't seen|I have not seen (I / not / see) Ali so far this morning.
7. The children have been|The children have gone (The children / go) to Disneyworld before.
8. We visited (We / visit) the Taj Mahal while we were in India.
9. Have you ever eaten (you / ever / eat) fish eyes?
10. I used to be a teacher but I didn't enjoy|I did not enjoy (I / not / enjoy) it.
